text: The Ruffian () is a 1983 French-Canadian crime adventure film written and directed by José Giovanni and starring Lino Ventura, Bernard Giraudeau and Claudia Cardinale.VV.AA. Variety Film Reviews, Volume 18. Garland Pub., 1989.Le Nouvel Observateur. Issues 947-964; Volume 947.
